ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( CASESAFEID( RecordTypeId )= '0123h000000tuXJAAY', NOT( OR( CONTAINS( Name , 'rfp' ) ,CONTAINS( Name , 'rfi'),CONTAINS( Name , 'rfq'), CONTAINS( Name , 'RFP') ,CONTAINS( Name , 'RFI' ),CONTAINS( Name , 'RFQ')) ) ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure that 'RFP', 'RFI', or 'RFQ' is in this opportunity's name.
